ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Anyone else seen this?
ygData.msgSnippet: Talk to a GM, they will probably have you email someone specific. If they refuse ask for the email anyhow. Explain the situation and depending on what kind of
ygData.messageBody:
Talk to a GM, they will probably have you email someone specific. If
they refuse ask for the email anyhow. Explain the situation and
depending on what kind of day the person had you may or may not get it
back. I've never gotten the shaft on lost item bugs before but people I
know have. However, not to be a downer, it was a bronze mace and they
may not deem it to be worth the effort. If you get past their lazyness
you aught get it back. Best of luck.

Ninev Desksleeper

--- JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:
> First off, this may not have happened. It was late, I was tired, and
> I could be loosing my mind.
>
> But I'm pretty sure when I died last night I had a mace on my cursor.
> I was still in the first bubble of a level which is when I always
> carry blunt, slashing, and piercing weapons to get my skills up.
> After looting my corpse, I just had slashing and piercing weapons. My
> inventory was not full (not even the main slots, let alone slots in
> containers) and in the past anything on the cursor at death has gone
> into inventory. I know I didn't drop it, I've got item dropping set
> on "never".
>
> So is this a bug or have I lost it completely?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, who accidentally sold her first bronze mace and has now
> apparently poofed her second.
